definitions.definition: Motivated by an inappropriate , excessive , or unjustified desire to impress others.
examples: Her dress was obviously more pretentious than comfortable.

definitions.definition: Marked by an unwarranted claim to importance or distinction .
examples: Their song titles are pretentious in the context of their basic lyrics.

main_definition: Motivated by an inappropriate , excessive , or unjustified desire to impress others.
secondary_definitions: Marked by an unwarranted claim to importance or distinction .
